name: Gun Dice
description:
A game for the GMTK Game Jam 2022, with a theme "Roll of a dice".

You are a dice and your goal is to survive endless waves of cards.

Controls:

WASD - moving

Left mouse - shooting

Right mouse - rolling yourself

By rolling yourself you reload your guns, and each side has different effects (positive or negative).
